detail_desc: Sleeveless romper suit in soft slub cotton jersey with broderie anglaise at the front, frills that continue over the shoulders and press-studs at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with smocked hems.
Fitted knee-length dress in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted knee-length dress in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
One-shoulder, knee-length dress in softly draping jersey with one long sleeve, a detachable tie belt at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with worn details and a visible seam front and back. Zip fly and button and a raw-edge hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets with a taped zip, and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets with a taped zip, and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with gathers at one side and long sleeves. Unlined.
Ankle-length, straight-style dress in a textured-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Slits in the sides and an overlocked hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and legs with seams and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Collarless jacket in supersoft faux fur with a zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and a high slit in one side.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and a high slit in one side.
Biker jacket in felted fabric with notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, long sleeves and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Biker jacket in felted fabric with notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, long sleeves and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, appliqués on the front and raw-edge hems.
Pyjamas in soft, stretch cotton jersey. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Straight-cut bottoms with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with embroidered appliqués on the front. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Small backpack in imitation suede and imitation leather with fringing, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a drawstring closure at the top. Lined. Size 11x22x25.5 cm.

Shopper in supple, grained imitation leather with two metal ring handles at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks at both ends. One inner compartment. The upper section of the shopper can be folded down so the bag can be carried as a shoulder bag. Lined. Size 6.5x30x35 cm.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a heart-shaped metal buckle. Width approx. 2 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Sunhat in a cotton weave with ears on top and ties under the chin. Lined.
Hat in a soft cable knit containing glittery threads with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties at the bottom. Fleece lining.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt. Lined at the front.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a rib-knit flounce at the hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a brushed finish with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim, 3/4-length legs with slits at the hems.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim, 3/4-length legs with slits at the hems.
Caps in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and back of the neck.
Caps in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and back of the neck.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace-covered V-neck and sewn in wrapover at the front with a concealed button at the neck. Lace yoke at the back, elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in twill made from a modal and cotton blend with an elasticated, frilled collar with tasselled ties and wide raglan sleeves with elastication and broderie anglaise at the cuffs.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in a soft cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Calf-length dress in a patterned, viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Jersey underskirt.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.
